com.renangomes.alexarankcache

Class AlexaRank

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.renangomes.alexarankcache.AlexaRank

  • public class AlexaRank
extends java.lang.Object
    AlexaRank class that will generate (on class load) a rank with top 1M URLs on Alexa. NOTE: This class will download and index the Alexa.com top 1M rank once it is loaded. This means that it can add a few seconds delay on the software load time.
    Since:
    17-06-2015

      • getInstance

        public static AlexaRank getInstance()

        Returns:

      • getRank

        public java.lang.Integer getRank(java.lang.String domain)
        Read the Rank for the domain name provided. NOTE: Before the search is done, this function will try to clear the URL in order to extract only a valid domain name.
        Parameters:
        domain - The string with a domain name or a partial URL
        Returns:
        The Rank position. NULL if the domain is not found.

      • getDomain

        public java.lang.String getDomain(java.lang.Integer rank)
        Read the Domain for the rank provided.
        Parameters:
        rank - The integer with the position
        Returns:
        The domain that is on the position provided. NULL if the position is not available.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is a sample usage of this class. It try to check some Domains and few rank positions.
        Parameters:
        args - Comand line arguments
